380  if ( success && pGoal->CanRetry() )
381  {
382  // only set this for the root node
383  // BB - changed! the retry goal option now
384  // always gives you the last stage.
385 
386  // Game::CGoalLink* p_parents = pGoal->GetParents();
387  // if ( p_parents->m_relative == 0 )
388  m_lastGoal = goalId;
389  }
390  }
391 
392  // move it back and forth from the inactive to the active list
393  // TODO: Maybe add an "AssertOnFail" flag
394  return success;
395 }

void Game::CGoalManager::InitializeAllGoals ( )

См. определение в файле GoalManager.cpp строка 816

817 {
818  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
819 
820  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
821  {
822  uint32 key;
823  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
824  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
825 
826  if( gamenet_man->InNetGame() && !pGoal->IsNetGoal())
827  {
828  continue;
829  }
830 
831  if ( !pGoal->IsLocked() && !pGoal->HasWonGoal() )
832  {
833  // check if this is a child of another goal
834  CGoalLink* pGoalParents = pGoal->GetParents();
835 
836  // support an always_initialize_goal flag, which
837  // allows designers to have goals that aren't tied to
838  // a chapter/stage
839  Script::CStruct* pGoalParams = pGoal->GetParams();
840 
841  int goal_chapter = pGoal->GetChapter();
842  int goal_stage = pGoal->GetStage();
843 
844  // printf("%s: %i.%i\n", Script::FindChecksumName( pGoal->GetGoalId() ), goal_chapter, goal_stage );
845  if ( pGoalParents->m_relative == 0 )
846  {
847  // if the goal isn't listed in chapter_info.q at all,
848  // the chapter and stage will default to -1.
849  // Always create these goals
850  if ( ( goal_chapter == m_currentChapter && goal_stage == m_currentStage )
851  || pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0x4e863e93, "always_initialize_goal" ) )
852  || pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0x981d3ad0, "edited_goal" ) ) )
853  {
854  pGoal->Init();
855  }
856  }
857  }
858  }
859 }

)

2315  // swap them

2322  p_ordered_goals->SetChecksum( j, temp2 );
2323  break;
2324  }
2325  }
2326  }
2327 
2328  // tack on the list of unordered goals
2329  for ( int i = 0; i < num_unordered_goals; i++ )

2339

2342

2344  if ( !p_view_goals_text )
2345  continue;
2346

2349  continue;

2352  // if ( !ProSpecificChallengesUnlocked() && pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xe0f96410,"pro_specific_challenge") ) )
2353  // continue;

2356 /* if ( !pGoal->HasWonGoal() && !IsPro() && pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xe0f96410,"pro_specific_challenge") ) )

3609  CGoal* pJustWonGoal = GetGoal( just_won_goal_id );
3610  CGoalLink* pJustWonParents = pJustWonGoal->GetParents();
3611  while ( pJustWonParents && pJustWonParents->m_relative != 0 )
3612  {
3613  just_won_goal_id = pJustWonParents->m_relative;
3614  pJustWonGoal = GetGoal( pJustWonParents->m_relative );
3615  pJustWonParents = pJustWonGoal->GetParents();
3616  }
3617  }
3618 
3619  // check the required total
3620  int num_goals = pCurrentStage->GetSize();
3621  int stage_total = 0;
3622 
3623  for ( int goal_index = 0; goal_index < num_goals; goal_index++ )
3624  {
3625  Script::CStruct* pGoalStruct = pCurrentStage->GetStructure( goal_index );
3626  uint32 goal_id;
3627  if ( pGoalStruct->GetChecksum( CRCD( 0x9982e501, "goal_id" ), &goal_id, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
3628  {
3629  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goal_id, false );
3630 
3631  if ( pGoal )
3632  {
3633  // resolve to parent goal id
3634  CGoalLink* pParents = pGoal->GetParents();
3635  while ( pParents && pParents->m_relative != 0 )
3636  {
3637  goal_id = pParents->m_relative;
3638  pGoal = GetGoal( pParents->m_relative );
3639  pParents = pGoal->GetParents();
3640  }
3641  }
3642 
3643  if ( pGoal )
3644  {
3645  if ( ( goal_id == just_won_goal_id && !pGoal->HasWonGoal() ) || ( pGoal->HasWonGoal() ) )
3646  {
3647  stage_total++;
3648  // printf( "you've won %s, stage_total = %i\n", Script::FindChecksumName( goal_id ), stage_total );
3649  }
3650  }
3651  else
3652  {
3653  // look for goal in other level
3654  Script::CStruct* pTempGoalParams;
3655  if ( mp_goalFlags->GetStructure( goal_id, &pTempGoalParams, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
3656  {
3657  int hasBeaten = 0;
3658  pTempGoalParams->GetInteger( "hasBeaten", &hasBeaten, Script::ASSERT );
3659  if ( hasBeaten != 0 )
3660  {
3661  // printf("you've beaten %s in another level\n", Script::FindChecksumName( p_comp->mNameChecksum ) );
3662  stage_total++;
3663  }
3664  }
3665  }
3666  }
3667  }
3668 
3669  // printf("stage_total = %i, stage_total_target = %i\n", stage_total, stage_total_target );
3670  if ( stage_total >= stage_total_target || force )
3671  {
3672  // we've beaten the stage
3673  if ( m_currentStage + 1 == num_stages )
3674  {
3675  // we've finished the chapter
3676  m_currentChapter++;
3677  m_currentStage = 0;
3678  }
3679  else
3680  {
3681  m_currentStage++;
3682  }
3683 
3684  // printf("m_currentStage = %i\n", m_currentStage);
3685  // reinitialize the chapter and stage
3686  UninitializeAllGoals();
3687  InitializeAllGoals();
3688 
3689  return true;
3690  }
3691  return false;
3692 }
